title: Exploring the Impact and Challenges of International Collaborative Online Learning (COIL)

context.prior_knowledge: Experience using online learning platforms, basic digital literacy, understanding of interdisciplinary collaboration
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment modeled after COIL case studies between universities in South Africa and Mexico.

learning_goals: Analyze the educational effectiveness of COIL from three or more cultural contextual dimensions
Identify five major challenges in international online collaboration and propose solutions
Design and execute a teamwork project in a virtual environment and submit the final deliverable
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
